original_title: 20th Century Masters: The Best of the Moody Blues
overview: Universal Music's The Best of the Moody Blues: The DVD Collection helped inaugurate the video version of the company's 20th Century Masters series. 1:	Your Wildest Dreams	2:	I Know You're Out There Somewhere	3:	The Other Side Of Life	4:	Running Out Of Love	5:	No More Lies
title: 20th Century Masters: The Best of the Moody Blues
